Reference

Source a file with Logging

Functionality for Creating logs from Scripts

axecute()

Create a log and run a file

run_safely_loudly()

Safely run an R script and record results, outputs, messages, errors, warnings

Logging Framework Functions

Functionality to Build The Log Manually

log_cleanup()

Cleans up log and does checks against elements

log_config()

Configures the timber.log environment

log_init()

Initialises the timber.log environment

log_remove()

Remove the timber.log environment by setting options("timber.log") to NULL

log_write()

Write the formatted timber.log to a file

Logging Helper Functions

Functionality to Interact With The Log Object(s)

get_file_path()

Gets full path of file being run

get_library()

Add libraries to functions

get_log_element()

Gets the value of a named element in the timber.log environment

get_masked_functions()

Returns named list of masked functions

get_session_info()

Returns Session Info

get_timber_metadata()

Returns named list of timber metadata attributes

get_unapproved_use()

Get unapproved packages and functions used

get_used_functions()

Get functions used within a file

set_log_element()

Adds values to existing named elements in the timber.log environment

set_log_name_path()

Set the log name and path:

  1. As the name and path if specified

  2. As the file name and path if specified

  3. As timber_log.log and . if none of the above are specified

approved

Approved packages and functions

approved_functions_init()

Initialises the timber.approved option

Write Log

Functionality for Writing Logs to a File

write_errors()

Format errors attribute for writing

write_file_name_path()

Format file name and path for writing

write_log_element()

Generic function to format timber.log elements for writing

write_log_header()

Generic function to format log section headers

write_masked_functions()

Format masked functions attribute for writing

write_messages()

Format messages attribute for writing

write_metadata()

Format timber.log's metadata attributes for writing

write_output()

Format output attribute for writing

write_result()

Format result attribute for writing

write_session_info()

Format timber.log's session info attribute for writing

write_unapproved_functions()

Format unapproved functions attribute for writing

write_used_functions()

Format used functions attribute for writing

write_warnings()

Format warnings attribute for writing

Utilities

Utility functions

loudly()

Capture errors, warnings, messages, and a stream output from executing R code

build_approved()

Build approved packages and functions tibble

RStudio addin

RStudio addin to facilitate the execution of a log

timberAddin()

timberAddin Code needed to create the miniUI for the Addin
